q: How can I contribute to the Open-ARCloud initiative?
a: A great starting point would be to join the slack-channel, introduce yourself to the community and start participating in conversations. If you are already involved in AR-cloud related projects we hope you can share your experience, code, results, and data openly with the community.

q: How is the Open-ARCloud initiative organized?
a: There is no formal organization, just a team of contributors and partner organizations that support the purpose of the initiative. For the purpose of facilitating and building a community this webpage, a Slack channel and a GitHub organization account have been put in place by the founder.

q: How can my organization partner with Open-ARCloud?
a: If your organization supports the purpose of Open-ARCloud it should be possible, just send an email to the main contact.
On the 16th of February 2018, when the founder bought the domain and started creating the website.

q: Does the initiative receive any funding?
a: Currently, there are no projects that require funding but that could change in the future.
It is intended to be a global initiative, open to participants from all over the world.
